entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
